verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> shall abide <S%H1481><s%> in thy tabernacle? <S%H168><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in thy holy <S%H6944><s%> hill? <S%H2022><s%>
He that walketh <S%H1980><s%> uprightly, <S%H8549><s%> and worketh <S%H6466><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and speaketh <S%H1696><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> in his heart. <S%H3824><s%>

He that backbiteth <S%H7270><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> his tongue, <S%H3956><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> to his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> taketh up <S%H5375><s%> a reproach <S%H2781><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> his neighbor. <S%H7138><s%>

In whose eyes <S%H5869><s%> a vile person <S%H3988><s%> is contemned; <S%H959><s%> but he honoreth <S%H3513><s%> them that fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%> He that sweareth <S%H7650><s%> to his own hurt, <S%H7489><s%> and changeth <S%H4171><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

He that putteth not out <S%H5414><s%> <S%H3808><s%> his money <S%H3701><s%> to usury, <S%H5392><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> taketh <S%H3947><s%> reward <S%H7810><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the innocent. <S%H5355><s%> He that doeth <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things shall never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5769><s%> be moved. <S%H4131><s%>
